itunes:title: Episode 066: Callisto (feat. Spencer Ackerman)
title: Episode 066: Callisto (feat. Spencer Ackerman)
itunes:author: Connor Goldsmith
description:
In Episode 66 of CEREBRO, Connor and returning guest Spencer Ackerman (Reign of Terror) sharpen their knives with the cunning Callisto! Leader of the Morlocks, a society of non-passing mutants living in poverty in the maintenance tunnels beneath Manhattan, Callisto debuts as an eager rival to Storm. In time she becomes one of the X-Men's staunchest allies, and in the Krakoan Age, she serves as White Knight of the Hellfire Trading Company. 

The CEREBRO character file on Callisto begins at 1:06:30.

(Content Advisory: Callisto's story includes genocide, the murder of children, sexual violence, attempted suicide, brainwashing, and non-consensual body modification.)



Advertising Inquiries: https://redcircle.com/brands
